channel.title: God of Ikiliki: How is he not banned?
channel.description: Guys, why or how isn't God of Ikiliki banned? He has his own community, and uses the no copy and paste tutorial on this site, to his advantage? He advertises, and gets other Runelocus faggots to advertise for him.

item.title: God of Ikiliki: How is he not banned?

item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

^Ya, he does get noobs to advertise his site…

item.title: God of Ikiliki: How is he not banned?
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“sppt, post:27, topic:208246”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=274518.msg2244698#msg2244698 date=1211861525]

[quote author=sppt link=topic=274518.msg2244550#msg2244550 date=1211856304]

the staff here a fucking morons

Back at you.

Will write a response later, too busy right now, and why is it not in the appropriate (sp?) section?
[/quote]If you used firefox, you wouldn’t have to worry about spelling!

If i had time, and no life at all, i’d write a 6 page story about how opera does support spell checking.
But i don’t, so i’ll keep it simple: Opera has it, but i forgot about it…
[/quote]Rofl, why would you write a six page story on it? Saying it does is sufficient, lol.

I was hinting at legit.
edit: who can also have a ban while we’re at it[/quote]

Legit hasn’t posted since I verbally owned yet has visited the forum every day, any idea what he’s up to?

Read full topic

item.title: God of Ikiliki: How is he not banned?
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

I banned him today. He is pissing me off, banning all of us for even joining his IRC network without speaking.

Then he tries and re-sucks up to me. Basically, he sucks up to anyone with power to get what he wants, then treats them like shit and does stuff behind their back.

Examples are:

-Taking a slice of moparscape by simply creating a replica community and stealing mitb’s profits, he got into a position of power used his popularity to steal away the members.

-Often gets banned from #mopar, he always comes and asks me to unban, sucking up etc etc, then I find out he has me IP banned from his site (no reason) and I join his IRC network and get banned/glined etc. Even has the cheek to say he’ll report me for banning him.

Read full topic
